name: Sewer Scamper
description:
See if you have the sewer-hopping, fish-tossing skills to reach Mizz's secret base!

This is Sewer Scamper, made for MizzJam #1. It plays like an endless runner but there is one single level with a few different challenges.  Hope you enjoy! This is technically the first game I've finished and released on my own. 

KNOW BUGS (will fix in future): 

- the game does not properly track Snack Collection. When you reach the end, it is likely that Mizz will say you you've collected a different amount of Snacks than you actually have.

- sometimes, you just through the floor haha
